param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update the enterprise user profile SCIM configuration
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the enterprise users SCIM configuration resource URI.

param.doc: The attribute to map to the SCIM attribute.

param.name: scim_subattribute
param.doc: For a multivalued attribute - the second level SCIM attribute name to be mapped. Eg: work or home for SCIM attribute email.

param.name: extended_scim_attributes
param.doc: The list of extended attributes.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the extended attribute (eg: type/primary/display/etc) These are the valid attributes from the schema. The type attribute is a mandatory extended attribute.

param.name: source
param.doc: The source of the name value. Can be an LDAP attribute, session attribute or fixed value depending on the type.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of attribute to map this scim extended attribute to (ldap/session/fixed). If the name of the extended attribute is "type" this value must be set as "fixed".
